name: stinkweed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of a number of wild plants that have a strong, unpleasant smell: These crops can become vulnerable to winter annuals like stinkweed. Field pennycress is known to most farmers as stinkweed.
More examplesFewer examplesWild buckwheat, stinkweed, and volunteer barley were among the other noticeable weed species.A study has found that a common farm weed known as stinkweed has the potential to make a greener type of fuel for aircraft.Winter annuals, such as stinkweed, need to be controlled after the harvest.
